title: Lagos to double tech contribution to GDP by 2030 – Commissioner
description:
Lagos State aims to double its tech economy’s contribution to GDP by 2030, leveraging innovation, AI, and new legislation like the Lagos Innovation Bill.

Read More: https://punchng.com/lagos-to-double-tech-contribution-to-gdp-by-2030-commissioner/
content: The Lagos State Commissioner for Innovation, Science, and Technology, Mr Olatunbosun Alake, has stated that the state plans to increase the contribution of Information and Communication Technology to… [+3958 chars]
